Chicken Fillet 2 

Cottage Cheese (grated) 1 packet 

Black Pepper (crushed) 1 tsp 

Salt to taste 

Green Chilies (crushed) 4 

Coriander Leaves (finely chopped) 1 bunch 

Whole Wheat 2 cups 

Oil (for frying) as required 

Flour 2 tbsp 

For Boiling Chicken: 

Garlic 4 cloves 

Black Pepper 4

1. Boil chicken fillets with 4 garlic cloves and 4 black pepper. Now finely chop chicken fillets 

2. Knead 2 cups whole wheat with salt. 

3. Mix together 1 packet cottage cheese, finely chopped chicken, crushed green chilies, 1 tsp crushed black pepper, 1 bunch finely chopped coriander leaves and salt . 

4. NOow dissolve 2 tbsp flour in some water and keep it aside. 

5. Roll small dough balls in the shape of a roti and spread ready chicken and cheese mixture in between. Now brush the edges of the roti with flour mixture and place another roti and seal the edges. 

6. Heat tawa and cook roti from both sides with oil and serve hot wit chutney.
